name: 教育実習 ～女子校生マニアックス～
summary: The plot of "Kyouiku Jisshuu ~Joshikousei Maniacs~" is rather simple: the protagonist is an ordinary Japanese man named Shingo, who is about to become an intern in a prestigious school. There is only one thing that makes the young man slightly nervous: all his students will be girls. And if that weren't enough, some of his new co-workers are young attractive women. Will Shingo concentrate on his job or succumb to the pleasures of the flesh?
info:
• 中文名: 教育实习：女子校生欲望之激狂
  • 剧本: 桑原文彦
  • 原画: 白米玄，白玄米
  • 音乐: 渡边宽太
  • 开发: Tetratech
  • 平台: PC-98，windows
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1996/12/13（PC-98），1997/06/27（windows）
  • 售价: 8800（税前9504，Windows版）
  • 官方网站: http://www.tetratech.co.jp/hp/top.html
